meanings.definition: A playing card with two spots or pips.
meanings.sent1: I drew a deuces card in the game.
meanings.sent2: He had a pair of deuces in his hand.
meanings.sent3: The deuces in the deck seemed to bring me luck.
meanings.sent4: The deuces in the game were my lucky charm.
meanings.sent5: The deuces on the card were bright red and stood out.

meanings.definition: A gesture of peace or farewell made by holding up the index and middle fingers in the form of a V.
meanings.sent1: She flashed a deuces sign as she left the room.
meanings.sent2: The athlete waved deuces to the cheering crowd.
meanings.sent3: The deuces gesture always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: His deuces sign was a symbol of friendship.
meanings.sent5: The deuces gesture is a universal sign of peace.

meanings.definition: Used to express goodbye or dismissal.
meanings.sent2: He casually said 'deuces' before walking away.
meanings.sent4: With a quick 'deuces', he left the room.
meanings.sent5: She waved and called out 'deuces' as she left the party.
